growthexperiments-desc: Lokhu kwandiswa kuqukethe ukuhlolwa okwenziwa ithimba le-Growth.
growthexperiments-config-validator-datat: U-$1 kulindeleke ukuthi abe ngu-$2, kodwa ngu-$3
growthexperiments-config-validator-conte: Ukungafani kwemodeli yokuqukethwe: Ifayela lokulungisa le-GrowthExperiments kufanele libe nemodeli yokuqukethwe ye-JSON, kutholwe $1
growthexperiments-config-validator-newco: I-ID yesibambi sohlobo lomsebenzi engavumelekile: $1 akulona inani elivumelekile
growthexperiments-config-validator-array: I-$1 inezinto eziningi kakhulu (ubukhulu obungu-$2 buvunyelwe)
growthexperiments-edit-config-last-edit-: [[$2]]: Kugcine ukubuyekezwa umsebenzisi ongaziwa u-$1 ([$3 diff]).
growthexperiments-edit-config-pretext: Leli khasi likuvumela ukuthi uhlele ukucushwa kwezici zeqembu [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Growth Growth]. Izohlela u- $1 esikhundleni sakho. Ungabona izinguquko zakho kumlando wekhasi walelo khasi.
growthexperiments-edit-config-pretext-ba: {{GENDER:|You}} ungaphinda ubonise isibhengezo ekhasini eliyisiqalo elisha, ukuze kufakwe isimemezelo ngemicimbi ebalulekile kwabasanda kungena. Uma u-{{GENDER:|you}} ufuna ukwenza njalo, {{GENDER:|you}} udinga ukuyengeza ku-[[ $1 ]] mathupha. Noma yikuphi okuqukethwe okwengezwe lapho kuzovezwa kusibhengezo esiphuzi phezulu kokuthi [[Special:Homepage]].
growthexperiments-edit-config-pretext-un: Leli fomu livumela abasebenzisi abakhethekile ukuthi bahlele ukucushwa kwezici zethimba [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Growth Growth].
growthexperiments-edit-config-feedback-h: Ingabe unayo imibono noma imibuzo mayelana naleli fomu?
growthexperiments-edit-config-config-cha: Ukucushwa kushintshiwe. Kungase kudingeke ukuthi ulinde amaminithi ambalwa ukuze izinguquko zisebenze.
growthexperiments-edit-config-help-panel: Izilungiselelo zephaneli yosizo

Iphaneli yosizo ingatholakala kunoma iyiphi indawo yamagama, kumodi yokufunda noma yokuhlela, njengoba kulungiselelwe ngezansi. Kuhlanganisa ikhono lokusesha usizo, uchofoze izixhumanisi zosizo, futhi ubuze imibuzo kubaluleki noma kudeski losizo.
Izikhala zamagama lapho iphaneli yosizo itholakala kumodi yokufunda
Izikhala zamagama ezinephaneli yosizo zikhutshaziwe kukho kokubili imodi yokufunda nokuhlela
Ikhasi ledeski losizo lapho imibuzo kufanele ithunyelwe khona kusukela kuphaneli yosizo.
Ikhasi ledeski losizo lapho imibuzo kufanele ithunyelwe khona kusukela kuphaneli yosizo.
Phezulu kwekhasi
Phansi kwekhasi
Ikhasi lendawo elithi "Buka izindatshana zosizo eziningi"
Izikhala zamagama ezizofakwa kuphaneli yosizo usesho lombhalo lwamahhala ukuze uthole usizo
Kufanele iqondiswe kuphi imibuzo evela kuphaneli yosizo?
Amakhasi ezingxoxo zomeluleki
Itafulo lokuthola usizo
Izixhumanisi zephaneli yosizo

Iphaneli yosizo ibonisa izixhumanisi ezinhlanu kanye nesixhumanisi esisodwa "sokubuka okwengeziwe". Lezi zingalungiselelwa ukuthi zibe yinoma yiziphi izixhumanisi ku-wiki, kodwa izincomo zifakiwe ngezansi.
1) Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo lokuqala (kunconyiwe: imanuwali yesitayela)
1) Ilebula yesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo lokuqala (kuyanconywa: "Imanuwali Yesitayela")
2) Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo yesibili (kunconyiwe: umhlahlandlela womhleli obonakalayo)
2) Ilebula yesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo yesibili (kuyanconywa: "Ihlelwa kanjani")
3) Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo lesithathu (kunconyiwe: ukufaka izithombe ezinomhleli obonakalayo)
3) Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo lesithathu (kunconyiwe: ukufaka izithombe ezinomhleli obonakalayo)
4) Ilebula yesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo yesine (kuyanconywa: "Usengeza kanjani isithenjwa")
1) Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo lokuqala (kunconyiwe: imanuwali yesitayela)
5) Ilebula yesixhumanisi sephaneli yosizo yesihlanu (kuyanconywa: "Indlela yokudala i-athikili")
growthexperiments-edit-config-homepage-i: Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi mayelana nokudala indatshana entsha
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo lesixhumanisi esimayelana nendlela yokwengeza izithombe kusihleli esibonakalayo
growthexperiments-edit-config-mentorship:
Abeluleki bangaba nezindima ezimbili. Ngokuzenzakalelayo, anikezwa ngokungahleliwe kwabasanda kufika. Kukhona inketho yabasebenzisi abafuna kuphela ukuba abeluleki kubantu abavela emicimbini noma emakilasini: abatholi noma yibaphi abasanda kungena abazabelwe bona, kodwa bangabafuna mathupha.

Inani elikahle labeluleki yileli: umeluleki oyedwa eqenjini ngalinye lama-akhawunti amasha angu-500, okungenani angu-3 abeluleki.

[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Growth/FAQ#Mentorship Yazi okwengeziwe ngendlela i-mentorship esebenza ngayo]
Yebo, vumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bahlangabezane nazo zonke izimo zokufaneleka ezingezansi ukuze babhalise njengabeluleki.
Cha, ungavumeli noma yibaphi abasebenzisi ukuthi babhalise njengabeluleki.
Inani elincane lezinsuku umsebenzisi okufanele abhaliswe ukuze abhalise njengomeluleki
Inombolo encane yokuhlela okumele ngabe yenziwe ngumsebenzisi (kunoma iyiphi indawo yamagama) ukuze abhalise njengomeluleki
growthexperiments-edit-config-personaliz: Ukwamukela imilayezo ekhuthazayo evela kubahleli abathembekile kungathuthukisa ukugcinwa komhleli omusha. Imojula yokudumisa yomuntu siqu iveza abahleli abasha abancomekayo kumeluleki wabo, ukusiza abahleli abasha abakhiqizayo bazizwe bebambeke kakhudlwana futhi behileleke emphakathini.
Abeluleki bangashintsha le nketho kubasebenzisi babo kudeshibhodi ye-Mentor.
Ngokuzenzakalela, abaqeqeshi kufanele bathole kangaki izaziso zokubakhumbuza ukuthi bathumele isikhuthazo kubaqeqeshi abahlela ngempumelelo (ngamahora)?
Inani elincane elizenzakalelayo lokuhlela umluleki kufanele afanele ukutuseka
Inani lezinsuku ezicatshangelwayo lapho kuhlolwa ukutuseka komluleki
Isibalo esiphezulu sokuhlela umsebenzisi angadingeka ukuthi kubhekwe njengokuncomekayo
growthexperiments-edit-config-newcomer-t: Ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlela eziphakanyisiwe zivezwa ngezifanekiso zokulungisa. Ama-athikili aqukethe lezo zifanekiso zengezwa kokuphakelayo. Ukuze ubone ukuthi zingaki iziqephu zendatshana ezitholakalayo ohlotsheni ngalunye lomsebenzi, bona [[Special:NewcomerTasksInfo|leli khasi]].
Ikhutshaziwe
Ikhutshaziwe ekucushweni kwesayithi
Kopisha ukuhlela: izifanekiso zokuthola izindatshana ezidinga ukuhlelwa kokukopishwa, njengokuthuthukiswa kwesipelingi, uhlelo lolimi, nokuthuthukiswa kwezimpawu zokuloba.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nokuhlela amakhophi.
Nweba: izifanekiso ukuze uthole ama-athikili adinga ukunwetshwa.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nokukhulisa ama-athikili.
Izixhumanisi: izifanekiso zokuthola izindatshana ezidinga izixhumanisi ezengeziwe.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nokuhlela amakhophi.
Izithenjwa: izifanekiso zokuthola izindatshana ezidinga izinkomba ezengeziwe.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nokukhulisa ama-athikili.
Isibuyekezo: izifanekiso zokuthola izindatshana ezidinga ukubuyekezwa ngolwazi lwamanje.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nokukhulisa ama-athikili.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nohlobo lomsebenzi wesiphakamiso sesixhumanisi.
Inombolo enkulu yeziphakamiso zesixhumanisi ezizoboniswa kumsebenzi ngamunye ophakanyisiwe.
Inombolo enkulu yokuthi "Engeza isixhumanisi" yemisebenzi ephakanyisiwe osanda kufika angakwazi ukuyiqeda nsuku zonke.
Uhlu lwamagama ezigaba lapho kungekho zixhumanisi okufanele zinconywe.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nohlobo lomsebenzi wesiphakamiso sesixhumanisi.
Inombolo enkulu yokuthi "Engeza isithombe ku-athikili engabonisiwe" imisebenzi ephakanyisiwe osanda kufika angayiqedela nsuku zonke.
Ikhasi okuyiwa kulo ukuze ufunde kabanzi mayelana nohlobo lomsebenzi wokuncoma isithombe sesigaba.
